title: Cinnamon nut crunch cake
ingredients: ['Cake', '175g (6 oz) caster sugar', '60g (2 oz) fresh butter', '1 egg', '4 tablespoons milk', '175g (6 oz) plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', 'pinch salt', 'Topping', '110g (4 oz) demerara sugar', '30g (1 oz) melted butter', '1 tablespoon flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons cinnamon', '60g chopped mixed nuts']
